name: unredressed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If something wrong that has been done is unredressed, nothing is done to put it right: In the absence of independent advocates, rights would go unprotected and wrongs unredressed. Wrong conduct of a public authority too often goes unredressed. Related word
redress
More examplesFewer examplesWhoever is behind this believes that he has unredressed grievances with the government. This is a grievance which has too long remained unredressed. Such violations of human dignity go unredressed if the perpetrators are in a position of privilege such that wealth and power enable them to avoid scrutiny.
